thread.title: FEES MUST FALL-A challenge to all legal practitioners
thread.title_full: FEES MUST FALL-A challenge to all legal practitioners | News24

author: news24.com
title: FEES MUST FALL-A challenge to all legal practitioners
text:
I would like to challenge all my legal brethren, to fulfill our obligation of undertaking Pro-Bono work.
I would like to challenge us all to provide pro-bono work for the students that have been arrested during these strikes.
I acknowledge that we have fees to write, however in the long run, the fees we will be writing will be ploughed right back into paying the exorbitant fees that these students are fighting against. So let us uphold our oath.
